name: handled-storefront-agent
description: Standalone Storefront Specialist Agent for HANDLED - deployed to Vertex AI Agent Engine

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx adk deploy cloud_run --project=${GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT:-handled-484216} --region=${GOOGLE_CLOUD_LOCATION:-us-central1} --service_name=storefront-agent
scripts.deploy:dry-run: npm run build && npx adk deploy cloud_run --project=${GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT:-handled-484216} --region=${GOOGLE_CLOUD_LOCATION:-us-central1} --service_name=storefront-agent --dry-run
